channel.title: Server glitch?
channel.description:
Hello im currently usin deltascape source/xscape and everytime when i leave my server on for about 4 hours it gets a error that says [code] Null Null null null [/code] Ect and everyone keeps repeatin everything on the game.. And lags And only way to stop it again is to turn server off and on..
Can you tell me how to stop this please Because im tryin to make my server 24/7 and its kinda hard when that null comes when im at skl and i cant make 24 7 if i keep gettin this error
Thanks

item.title: Server glitch?
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Hello im currently usin deltascape source/xscape and everytime when i leave my server on for about 4 hours it gets a error that says

Null
Null
null
null

Ect and everyone keeps repeatin everything on the game… And lags And only way to stop it again is to turn server off and on…

Thanks
